articles.description: Gloria Calderón Kellet's rom-com series unfolds over five significant holidays, chronicling the loves and heartbreaks of a tight-knit Mexican American family in Portland, Oregon.
articles.content: If you are of the mind that no holiday is complete without a sugar rush, With Love aims to satisfy that craving. The new rom-com series by Gloria Calderón Kellet weaves together not one, not two, but… [+4843 chars]

articles.title: Priyanka Chopra Glows in 6-inch Gold Heels & Glittery Green Top on ‘Good Morning America’ - Footwear News
articles.description: Chopra stepped into the GMA studio wearing a green and silver dress. The model's ensemble was complete with a shiny green button-up shirt and a cream floral wrap skirt. For footwear, she opted for stappy metallic pumps that included 6-inch heel.
